attributes.action: End covid restrictions in Wales in line with England
attributes.additional_details:
The initial lockdown was to protect the NHS, and with the 'vaccine' program doing so well the majority of the vulnerable population now protected, and therefore the NHS.
Figures are out there to show the hospitalizations and deaths are very low.
We need to stop worrying about he infection rate as covid is something we will he living with.

We need to all move forward as 1 country, and Wales has the lowest figures so we do not need to be under restrictions.
Take the restrictions away when England do to prevent confusion and stop any further damage to our economy.
People have had enough living like this now!
attributes.background:
All the home nations should end covid restrictions at the same time and move forward as 1 country.
The rules are confusing having 4 different sets

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee.

If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Parliament, you can find out more here:
https://petitions.senedd.wales/
